languages.text: {n}Старый священник сдержанно кивает. Молодой всем телом поворачивается к вам и становится похож на ученика на экзамене.{/n}
{n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Старый священник сдержанно кивает. Молодой всем телом поворачивается к вам и становится похож на ученика на экзамене.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod as the younger priest turns his whole body to face you like a student who is being evaluated.{/n}
{n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod as the younger priest turns his whole body to face you like a student who is being evaluated.{/n}
{n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}
{n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}
{n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}
{n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}

languages.text: {n}年迈的牧师矜持地点了点头，而年轻的牧师则把整个身体转向你，就像是学徒在接受评估一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}年迈的牧师矜持地点了点头，而年轻的牧师则把整个身体转向你，就像是学徒在接受评估一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}老司祭は控えめにうなずいた。一方で、若い方は評価を受ける学生のように、体全体をこちらに向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老司祭は控えめにうなずいた。一方で、若い方は評価を受ける学生のように、体全体をこちらに向けた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El viejo sacerdote te saluda asintiendo discretamente con la cabeza. El más joven, por contra, se vuelve del todo hacia ti como un estudiante que estuviera siendo evaluado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El viejo sacerdote te saluda asintiendo discretamente con la cabeza. El más joven, por contra, se vuelve del todo hacia ti como un estudiante que estuviera siendo evaluado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı rahip, vakur bir şekilde başını sallıyor. Bu arada genç olan, inceleme altındaki bir öğrenci gibi tüm vücudunu sana çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Büyük olan rahip vakur bir şekilde başını sallıyor. Bu arada küçük olan, inceleme altındaki bir öğrenci gibi tüm vücudunu sana çeviriyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vieux prêtre vous adresse un signe de tête réservé tandis que le plus jeune se tourne vers vous, comme un étudiant lors d'un examen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieux prêtre vous adresse un signe de tête réservé tandis que le plus jeune se tourne vers vous, comme un étudiant lors d'un examen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der alte Priester nickt dir reserviert zu. Der junge hingegen dreht dir seinen ganzen Körper zu, wie ein Schüler bei einer Prüfung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old priest gives you a reserved nod. Meanwhile, the younger one turns his entire body to face you, like a student being evaluated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Priester nickt dir reserviert zu. Der junge hingegen dreht dir seinen ganzen Körper zu, wie ein Schüler bei einer Prüfung.{/n}
